name: Fox Four
description:
FOX FOUR (working title)

Small demo/prototype for a flying game made in Tic-80.

UI is just a mockup, there's no combat in the game yet.

# Controls

Left and right arrow keys will turn the plane

Up and down arrow keys control throttle

Z to shoot (currently nothing to shoot at)

X to pause and select in menu

Project, including code and assets, is released under GPLv3 License
